issue.title: Save gazebo log file for each test in Jenkins

content.raw:
I'm having some problems implementing this. We have a static ("singletonian") instance of ::common::Console::log that is kept during the full test execution. When trying to gzInitLog with a new log filename (in fact I think that it was happening before) it falls into [this check for initialization already done](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/2d174a59f15598fb03de23637d6abf3b586ea2a2/gazebo/common/Console.cc?at=default#cl-141) and the file is not created.

@scpeters , @nkoenig : any advise about how to fix or workaround this? Thanks.
content.html:
I'm having some problems implementing this. We have a static ("singletonian") instance of ::common::Console::log that is kept during the full test execution. When trying to gzInitLog with a new log filename (in fact I think that it was happening before) it falls into this check for initialization already done and the file is not created.

@scpeters , @nkoenig : any advise about how to fix or workaround this? Thanks.
